content.p: The D. H. Lawrence Research Centre is actively involved in research events, exhibitions, and conferences, all of which directly relate and contribute to the study of Lawrence's life and works. Here you can find out about the latest news and events, as well as access an archive containing details of past events. There are no results that match your criteria. Trent Building University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD telephone: +44 (0) 115 846 6456 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 5924 email: andrew.harrison@nottingham.ac.uk
